app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Voice Recorder Recording
app_description: The BEST and MOST Convenient Voice Recorder! FEATURES: Voice to text. Transfer recordings to computer easily using WiFi. Password Protect function to keep your private recordings safe. Tag special points of a track as many as you want while recording or during playback. Immediately jump to a tag by one tap during playback. Record and playback in the background. Auto save ensures that you never lose any recording.
